translations.hero_img_alt: Fabián Avendaño training intensely with kettlebells in the gym.
translations.hero_subtitle: Personal and online training tailored to your goals: weight loss, muscle gain and general health.
translations.mondayDesc: We build real power with movements that matter.
translations.tuesdayDesc: We unleash energy and overcome your mental limits.
translations.wednesdayDesc: We strengthen the body with functional movements.
translations.thursdayDesc: Where there is pause, there is power. We connect with the body.
translations.fridayDesc: Each repetition brings you closer to the person you want to be.
translations.saturdayDesc: The environment also trains. Enjoy the movement.
translations.program1ImgAlt: Fabián Avendaño at the gym - 28 Day Challenge
translations.program1Title: 28 Day Challenge: Your Transformation Starts Today
translations.program1Subtitle: Start with 7 Days of Totally Free Access
translations.program1Desc: A proven plan that combines strength, cardio, and active calm. Train from scratch or boost your results with 45-minute routines you can do at home or in the gym.
translations.program1Cta: I WANT TO START FOR FREE!
translations.program2Subtitle: For those seeking the next level
translations.program2Desc: A program designed to take you from basic to intermediate level with advanced techniques and higher training intensity.
translations.program3Subtitle: Building strength and stability from the simple
translations.program3Desc: 4-week strength program (2 days per week) with a full body focus. Day 1 focused on pushes and Day 2 on pulls. One basic exercise per session is prioritized with more sets to progress in load.
translations.program4Desc: High-intensity interval training program for 4 weeks, 2 days per week. Perfect for people with little time who want effective results.
translations.program4Features: 2 Days · Full Body · 45 min · Warm Up
translations.program5ImgAlt: Fabián Avendaño at the beach - Basic HIIT
translations.program5Desc: High-intensity interval training program for 4 weeks, 3 days per week. For those seeking accelerated transformation.
translations.program6ImgAlt: Fabián Avendaño - Glute Frequency Legs Program
translations.program6Desc: Specialized 6-week program for full development of legs and glutes. 3 weekly sessions with systematic progression.
translations.program6Features: Hip Thrust · Squats · Deadlift · Step Training
translations.testimonial1: I never thought I could achieve so much in so little time. The program is amazing and Fabián is always there to motivate you.
translations.testimonial2: The methodology really works. I gained muscle mass and feel stronger than ever. Totally recommended.
translations.testimonial3: Not only did my body change, my mindset changed too. Now I have confidence and energy for everything I do.
translations.aboutP1: My philosophy is simple: meaningful sacrifice transforms lives. For over 8 years, I have helped hundreds of people discover their best version through smart training and the right mindset.
translations.aboutP2: I firmly believe that everyone has the potential to achieve extraordinary results. My job is to guide you on that path, providing you with the tools, knowledge, and support you need to reach your goals.
translations.aboutP3: The change has already started. You just need to take the first step.
translations.aboutImgAlt: Fabián Avendaño walking on the beach - Personal Trainer
translations.footerDesc: Transforming lives through smart training and the right mindset.
